title: Oxford-AstraZeneca: Denmark suspends vaccine 'as a precaution'
description: The decision follows a death and reports of blood clots, but the health minister says no link is established.
content:
image captionDenmark's health authority says the hold on the rollout of the Oxford-AstraZeneca vaccine is temporary

title: The Hebrides' wild swimming 'real-life' mermaid
description: Kate Macleod can be found swimming in seas and lochs around the Western Isles in summer - and winter.
content:
A wild swimmer has been exploring the Western Isles' coast in a custom-made mermaid tale.
